body:
I've patched the remaining tests for pref type checking, ~however there appears to be an unrelated test failure (that even exists on the actual `preference-experiment` branch). Specifically, it relates to the `start did not modify the default preference` test - I don't know if this is a known issue or not.~ _Edit: Just checked IRC, this is a known issue._

Either way, this PR should be ready for review! @Osmose @mythmon

body_html:
I've patched the remaining tests for pref type checking, however there appears to be an unrelated test failure (that even exists on the actual preference-experiment branch). Specifically, it relates to the start did not modify the default preference test - I don't know if this is a known issue or not. Edit: Just checked IRC, this is a known issue.

Either way, this PR should be ready for review! @Osmose @mythmon
